short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A free Chrome Extension designed to help developers to develop their VisualForce Page or HTML Page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Version 1.0 Features:
 - On code instant HTML page preview
 - HTML5 + VisualForce Tags library included
 - Preload HTML + Visualforce Code
 - Lightweight
 - Compatible with standard Visualforce Page Editor
